title: Type face identification
content:
Can anyone identify this slender font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090731144410im_/http:/typophile.com/files/real_6666.jpg)
author: kelt101

comments.content:
Really hard to tell with this example, but I want to say its Centaur small caps.

Patrick
It is [Centaur MT Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20090731144410/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/centaur/bold/) with fake small caps.
